description: The enumeration of the possible alias types that can be bound to a principal.  Note, these names must match those in AliasEnum. For an OAuthProvider type the matching alias is prefixed with USER_
name: AliasType

enum.name: USER_NAME
enum.description: Alias used for the unique username of a user

enum.name: TEAM_NAME
enum.description: Alias used for the unique name of a team

enum.name: USER_EMAIL
enum.description: Alias used for the email address of a user

enum.name: USER_ORCID
enum.description: Alias used for the ORCID identity of a user
